title: Drawing, "Winged Victory Gives Apollo Lyre; Statue of Minerva"
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed: la vitoria presenta la lira ad Apollo; Statua di Minerva salvata dalle donzelle d'Argo.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Winged Victory Gives Apollo Lyre; Statue of Minerva".
Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2070.
